content.rendered:
Directed by Milan Luthria.

Written by Rajat Arora.

Cast Ajay Devgn(Bhawani Singh). Ileana D’Cruz(Gitanjali). Emraan Hashmi(Dalia). Esha Gupta(Sanjana). Vidyut Jammwal(Major Seher Singh (as Vidyut Jamwal)). Sanjay Mishra(Guruji). Denzil Smith(Rudra Singh). Sunny Leone(Dancer). Lankesh Bhardwaj(Supdt. of Police -Meena). Priyanshu Chatterjee(Sanjeev, Politician). Arjun Dwivedi(Somesh).Ravi Kale. Sharad Kelkar(Durjan Singh). Aishmita Meena(Drought village lady).JoÃ£o Miranda.Ana Monteiro. Yugant Badri Pandey(Yugant bhati (as Yugant Pandey)). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)). Satkeer(Singer). Gulshan Pandey(Inspector Dilip Singh (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Ravi Chaturvedi. Hanif Chunawala. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Milan Luthria. Aditya Mandke. Hussain Shaikh. Salim Shaikh. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production T-Series. Vertex Motion Pictures.
